title: Freshman Orientation
description: First day at FAST National University when nobody knew where any classroom was. Muhammad Zubair was already helping everyone navigate the campus.

title: First Programming Competition
description: The first time we competed as a team. Ammad stayed up all night to solve that one algorithm problem.

title: Finals Week Survival
description: 3 AM in the FAST library. Everyone running on caffeine while Afaq somehow remained calm and organized throughout.

title: Hackathon Victory
description: When our team won the national hackathon. Arif's presentation skills saved the day!

title: FAST Tech Fest
description: The annual tech festival where Basit's robot stole the show and we all celebrated with late-night shawarmas.

title: Cricket Tournament
description: The inter-department cricket tournament where Bilal Ibex hit that legendary six in the final over.

title: Midnight Food Run
description: When Moez convinced everyone to drive to Chai Wala at 2 AM during project week and we brainstormed our final project there.

title: Project Exhibition
description: Final year project exhibition where Zain Kazmi's team built that impressive AI system that got attention from industry professionals.

title: Last Lecture
description: The emotional last lecture where Yousouf asked that question that made even the strictest professor laugh.

title: Pre-Graduation Meetup
description: Planning session for the bachelor's party where Shoaib came prepared with a full presentation and budget spreadsheet.

title: Database All-Nighter
description: When Mohsin Brother helped everyone fix their database projects the night before submission.

title: Farewell Planning Committee
description: Burhan Hashimi leading the farewell planning committee with his incredible organizational skills.
